H0.text: Which acid is contained in Grapes. Citric Acid

H1.text: Which acid is contained in Grapes. Malic Acid

H2.text: Which acid is contained in Grapes. Tartaric Acid

H3.text: Which acid is contained in Grapes. E334

A4.text: Tartaric acid is a white, crystalline organic acid that occurs naturally in many fruits, most notably in grapes

A5.text: Tartaric acid provides some of the tartness in the wine, although citric and malic acids also play a role
